name: Eddy Restaurant (Kakabeka Falls), The
text:
FRESH AND FRAGRANT
STARTERS
MOZZA STICKS $14
Indulge in our house made mozzarella sticks, perfectly crispy and paired with marinara sauce
THE EDDY NACHOS $18
Tortillas crisped in-house then topped with mixed cheese, tomatoes, red & green peppers, green onions, black olives & jalapeños. Served with our chef's house salsa
SWEET POTATO FRIES $10
Fried to a golden crisp. Served with Sweet Chili Aioli
SPINACH & ARTICHOKE DIP $16
Creamy cheese, bell peppers, onion, spinach & artichokes. Dusted with Panko & Parmesan. Served with tortilla chips & fresh salsa.
ONION RINGS $10
Served with house-made beer cheese sauce.
DEEP FRIED PICKLES $12
Fried and served with ranch.
WINGS, RINGS & FRIES $18
Boneless chicken bites tossed in your choice of sauce and a side of ranch, Onion Rings and beer cheese sauce, Fries & Gravy.
SWEET CHILI CHICKEN BITES $18
Boneless chicken bites tossed in sweet chili sauce, red onion, red, green peppers, diced tomatoes and cilantro with sweet chili aioli and served with a side of ranch.
WINGS Single Order - $17 | Double Up - $28
Traditional Bone-in or Boneless Bites
Crisped to perfection then tossed in your choice of sauce. Complimented with Carrot & Celery sticks and ranch for dipping
BUFFALO QUESADILLAS $15
Grilled smokey chicken breast tossed in buffalo sauce, diced tomato, bacon, green pepper, green onion and encased in a crisp tortilla wedge. Served with salsa and sour cream
DAILY-MADE ALWAYS-FRESH
SATISFYING SOUPS
SOUP OF THE DAY Large $9
Made from scratch, in-house and served with a slice of garlic toast.
FRENCH ONION SOUP Large $9
Homemade and rich with caramelized onions. Topped with garlic toast and melted cheese.
A BACK TO TOP
FRESH GREENS
SALADS
CRISP, VIBRANT, AND UTTERLY REFRESHING - NATURE'S BOUNTY IN A BOWL.
SERVED WITH A SLICE OF GARLIC TOAST
CEASER SALAD Side $8/Full $13
Indulge in fresh romaine, bacon bits, and house-made croutons, all tossed in our delectable Ceasar dressing, topped with shredded parmesan
GREEK SALAD Side $8/Full $13
Experience a medley of mixed greens, romaine, tomatoes, red onions, cucumber, and kalamata olives all tossed in our tantalizing Greek dressing. Crowned with feta cheese.
HOUSE SALAD Side $8/Full $13
A delightful blend of spring mixed greens, romaine, tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion, all tossed in our signature house-made vinaigrette.
TREAT YOURSELF!
ADD A GRILLED CHICKEN BREAST TO YOUR SALAD $5
POUTINE
TRADITIONAL $14
Poutine with house-made beef cheese curds, all tossed in a house-made gravy
BUFFALO CHICKEN $17
Deep-fried and breaded chicken bites tossed in buffalo chicken sauce, mixed with cheese curds, all tossed in our house-made gravy and served with buffalo ranch sauce.
THE EDDY POUTINE $17
Hand-cut fries, ground beef, green onions, peppers, tomato & cheese curds covered in house made gravy.
MAINS
MADE WITH LOVE
THE EDDY BURGER $19
Our signature Eddy burger with a juicy beef patty topped with crumbled cheese bacon, mushrooms and onion rings on a freshly toasted brioche bun. Served with a slice of house-made beer cheese sauce. Served with fries.
JALAPENO, BACON, CHEDDAR BURGER $18
A juicy beef patty topped with a bacon, jalapeño, cheddar, lettuce, tomato and red onion. Served with fries
MUSHROOM & SWISS BURGER $18
Juicy beef patty topped with mushrooms, onions, Swiss cheese. Served with bacon and an onion ring.
CHICKEN CORDON BLEU BURGER $17
Crispy chicken breast, ham, Swiss cheese, mayo, and our secret Eddy sauce. Served with fries
BUTTER FINGERS $17
Crispy chicken strips, tossed in a house-made butter sauce. Served with fries
BEER BATTERED FISH FILLETS 1 PIECE - $18 | 2 PIECE - $23
Our crispy, golden beer-battered fish fillets. Served with fries and a side of coleslaw and a wedge of lemon.
BEER BATTERED FISH BURGER $15
Crispy, golden beer-battered fish fillet. Served with tartar sauce, lettuce and tomato. Served with fries and coleslaw.
THE HAMBURGER - $15
START WITH A TOASTY BUN AND OUR HAND PRESSED SOY-GROUND BEEF PATTIES, TOPPED WITH LETTUCE, TOMATO, ONIONS, PICKLES, AND MAYO. ENJOY YOUR BURGER WITH FRIES.
WHAT'S AVAILABLE:
DOUBLE PATTY +$2
TRIPPLE PATTY +$4
ADD CHEESE +$2
ADD BACON +$3
GLUTEN FREE BUN OR BREAD +$2
UPGRADE YOUR SIDE:
SOUP DE JOUR $3
SWEET POTATO SIDES $4
CEASER, GREEK OR HOUSE SALAD $5
BREAKFEAST
MORNING CLASSICS
GET YOUR DAY STARTED RIGHT WITH THESE TIMELESS MORNING DISHES, SERVED WITH CRISPY HOME FRIES AND PERFECTLY TOASTED BREAD.
THE EDDY BENNY $16
Two perfectly poached eggs, ham, and our house-made hollandaise sauce.
THE EDDY $18
Hand-pressed beef patty, hashbrowns, bacon, ham, sausage and two scrambled eggs.
EGGS BENEDICT $16
Two perfectly poached eggs on a toasted english muffin, topped with rich hollandaise sauce and ham.
BREAKFAST BOWLS
SATISFY YOUR HUNGER WITH THESE HEARTY BOWLS, SERVED WITH A SIDE OF TOAST
THE EDDY SCRAMBLER $17
Two perfectly scrambled eggs with ham, bacon, peppers, green onions, mixed cheese, and crumbled eggs. Served with home fries.
BREAKFAST POUTINE $17
Home fries, cheese curds, green onions, mixed peppers, mushrooms, hollandaise sauce, and gravy.
OMELET CHOICES
INDULGE IN THESE FLAVOURFUL OMELETS, SERVED WITH HOME FRIES AND YOUR CHOICE OF TOAST.
MEAT LOVERS $18
A savory omelet filled with bacon, ham, sausage, and mixed cheese.
DENVER $17
A classic Denver omelet with diced ham, bell peppers, ham, bacon, green onion, and mixed cheese.
GREEK $15
A flavorful Greek omelet with black olives, tomatoes, red onions, and tangy feta cheese.
SWEET AND SAVOURY
INDULGE YOUR TASTE BUDS WITH THESE SWEET AND SAVORY OPTIONS. INCLUDES PURE MAPLE SYRUP, SERVED WITH YOUR CHOICE OF BUTTERMILK PANCAKES, BACON, HAM, OR SAUSAGE.
BUTTERMILK PANCAKES $15
Three fluffy pancakes with pure maple syrup.
FINN PANCAKES $15
Three pancakes with blueberries, served with bacon, ham, or sausage.
FRENCH TOAST $14
Three pieces of perfectly grilled bread, accompanied by your choice of bacon, ham or sausage.
LIGHER OPTIONS
ENJOY A LIGHTER BREAKFAST WITH THESE GOURMET OPTIONS.
SENIOR SPECIAL+ $13
One egg, your choice of bacon, ham, or sausage, and a slice of toast.
ONE EGGER $9
One egg, your choice of bacon, ham, or sausage, a slice of toast.
LITTLE CAKES $7
Two pancakes served with your choice of pure maple syrup.
HANDHELD TREATS
FOR A QUICK AND SATISFYING BREAKFAST, TRY THESE HANDHELD DELIGHTS
BREAKFAST SANDWICH $9
A classic fried egg with melted cheese on a toasted English muffin
WESTERN SANDWICH $12
A classic Western omelet with two scrambled eggs, ham, bacon, sausage, green onion, and a drizzle of hollandaise. Served with salsa
KB WRAP $12
A soft flour tortilla filled with grilled chicken breast, bacon, green onions, and salsa. Served with fries or salad
DENVER SANDWICH $18
A classic Denver sandwich with two scrambled eggs, ham, bell peppers, green onion, and a drizzle of hollandaise. Served with fries or salad
TREAT YOURSELF!
ADD HOME FRIES ON THE SIDE $4
SIDES
HOME FRIES $4
TOAST $3
SIDE BACON, HAM, OR SAUSAGE $5
EGG $2.50
BUTTERMILK PANCAKE $5
FINN PANCAKE $5.50
BEVERAGES
COFFEE CORNER
FRESHLY BREWED MOTHER PARKER'S
REGULAR COFFEE $2.75
DECAF COFFEE $2.95
TEA TEMPTATIONS
SIP AND SAVOR THE FINEST TEA BLENDS
REGULAR TEA $1.95
GREEN TEA $1.95
HERBAL TEA $1.95
Camming Chamomile
Lavender
Peppermint
BLACK TEA $1.95
English Breakfast
Earl Grey
Chai Spice
DECAF BLACK TEA $1.95
MILK MARVELS
CREAMY INDULGENCES FOR ALL AGES
MILK $2.50 / $3.50
CHOCOLATE MILK $2.50 / $3.50
REFRESHING FRUIT JUICES
NATURE'S NECTAR: BURSTING WITH FRESHNESS
APPLE JUICE $2.50 / $3.50
ORANGE JUICE $2.50 / $3.50
FIZZLING FOUNTAIN FAVORITES
BUBBLY BLISS IN EVERY SIP
PEPSI $2.99
DIET PEPSI $2.99
BRISK ICED TEA $2.99
GINGER ALE $2.99
ROOT BEER $2.99
7 UP $2.99
WRAPS
ADD A SIDE OF HAND CUT FRIES - $4
SOUP DU JOUR - $5
SWEET POTATO FRIES - $5
CEASER, GREEK OR HOUSE SALAD - $5
COUNTRY RANCH CHICKEN WRAP $13
Delight in crisp chicken breast strips, mixed greens, tomato, mixed cheese, and our house-made buttermilk ranch
BUFFALO CHICKEN WRAP $13
Savor crispy chicken breast strips tossed in buffalo sauce, mixed greens, bits of bacon, and garlic parmesan aioli
PHILLY STYLE WRAP $14
Tender sliced beef, sauteed onions and peppers, mixed cheese, and Dijon aioli
REUBEN WRAP $14
Montreal smoked meat, sauerkraut, swiss cheese slices and our Roddy sauce all wrapped into a tortilla.
HANDHELDS
SERVED WITH A SIDE OF HAND CUT FRIES
RUEBEN $18
Indulge in Montreal smoked meat, house-made sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and our secret rody sauce enclosed between marble rye slices
EDDY CLUB $19
Relish a grilled chicken breast crowned with melted cheddar, bacon slices, spring mix, and tomato, all snugly positioned between two slices of toasted bread of your choice brushed with mayo
PHILLY STEAK $19
Satisfy your cravings with a toasted hoagie bun crowned with sliced beef, heaped with sauteed peppers & onions, and smothered in melted mixed cheese
FRISCO MELT $18
Hand-made patty, topped with caramelized onions, signature Roddy's sauce, swiss cheese on grilled rye bread.
BLT $16
Classic BLT with lettuce, tomato, mayo and bacon. Served on your choice of toast.
LUNCH TRIO $16
Soup of the day, half sandwich of the day, and your choice of a small salad.
KID APPROVED
KID MEALS COME WITH A SMALL BEVERAGE
LIL' MARIO BURGER $11
A 5oz patty graced with ketchup and house-made pickles. Served with fries or salad
MAC N CHEESE $9
Delight in creamy cheese sauce cloaking pasta noodles complemented by a slice of toasted white bread
LIL' FINGERS $9
Discover 2 lightly dusted chicken breast fillets, accompanied by plum sauce for dipping, and served with fries or salad
LIL' NACHOS $9
Experience crisp fried corn chips crowned with mixed cheese and served with salsa
SIDES
FRIES $5 / $8
POUTINE $8 / $12
GRAVY $1.50
DIP $1
CHILLED CAN DELIGHTS
CHILL OUT WITH A CAN IN HAND
SPARKLING WATER $1.99

Grapefruit Bubbly
